properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 12 at 10:23PM CST until February 13 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a

* Flood Advisory for...
Marion County in northwestern Alabama...
Northern Lamar County in west central Alabama...

* Until 130 AM CST.

* At 1022 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to
thunderstorms. This will cause minor flooding in the advisory area.
Up to one to two inches of rain have already fallen.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Hamilton, Sulligent, Hackleburg, Detroit, Beaverton, Brinn, Weston,
Bear Creek, Henson Springs, Tessner, Shottsville, Pearces Mill,
Rankin Fite Airport, Byrd, Pine Springs, Bexar, Pigeye, Marion
County Public Lake and Pikeville.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.
